name: ToDoApp
description: ## Schema ### tasks table column name | datatype | details ------------|----------|-------- id          | integer  |`null:false` task_name        | string   |`null:false` parent_task_id | integer | `null: true` completed   | boolean  | default to false creator_id  | integer  |`null:false` assignee_id | integer  |`null:false` [default to creator_id] due_date    | datetime |`null:false` <!--Maybe null:true ??? --> created_at  | datetime |  updated_at  | datetime |
